short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to customize GPT chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing CustomGPT: a dynamic Chrome Extension designed to redefine your AI conversation experience on the OpenAI ChatGPT website (https://chat.openai.com/).

While ChatGPT has revolutionized AI interaction, its default, neutral personality might not satisfy all needs. CustomGPT steps in to inject personalized style into your prompts, guiding ChatGPT's responses to your unique tastes.

Desire more direct answers? Crave a conversation partner with emotional depth? Seek technical explanations? CustomGPT puts you in control.

Key Features:

Personalize Your Experience: Predefined styles available or inject your own to influence AI responses.
Seamless Integration: Once installed, CustomGPT blends with the ChatGPT interface effortlessly.
Data Privacy: Your data remains your own; we neither collect nor store it.
